title: Blood Moon Elise Chroma Pack
body:
Sup fellow summoners,
i have been getting really good with {{champion:60}} and i was going to buy a skin for her. I really like all the chroma packs around and i was dissapointed that there wasn't one for Elise. If you guys could help me by wanting a chroma pack for Elise please help.

replies.body: Elise would look awesome in green..
I will play {{champion:60}}  if there is a green or purple Chroma Pack
